meanings.definition: In a way that shows awareness and understanding of the feelings of others.
meanings.sent1: She spoke sensitively to her friend who was feeling sad.
meanings.sent2: He always listens sensitively when someone shares their problems.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the dog sensitively, as if understanding its barking.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the scene sensitively, capturing every emotion on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher handled the situation sensitively, ensuring no one felt left out.

meanings.definition: In a way that is easily affected or influenced by external factors.
meanings.sent1: Her skin reacted sensitively to the new lotion she tried.
meanings.sent2: The delicate flower petals wilted sensitively under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The car alarm went off sensitively at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat sensitively with every word she spoke.
meanings.sent5: The old book's pages turned sensitively at the lightest breeze.

meanings.definition: In a way that is responsive to changes or stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The thermometer reacted sensitively to the rising temperature.
meanings.sent2: The security system is designed to respond sensitively to any movement.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced sensitively to the music, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked sensitively, adapting to new information quickly.
meanings.sent5: The plant grew sensitively towards the sunlight, seeking its warmth.
